"Yeah, I thought she'd be here!":
"U-Uh... I'm not really sure of
the best way to ask this, but..."

"We were able to learn a lot about
Dark Falz back in Lost Central..."

"We have to fight something that's been evolving
and growing even stronger than before..."

"But it'll be fine!
We just have to fight together as one!"

"Right... You've gotten so much stronger, Aina.
You're like a whole new person."

"Of course, you have as well.
Even so..."

"Fighting against Dark Falz...
requires so many lives to be sacrificed..."

"When I think about those horrors of war
spreading even further... It scares me."

"Attention all ARKS on standby
in Central City."

"Crawford has called for an emergency assembly.
Please make your way here. Thank you."
